about_the_game:
Embark on a gripping VR cop simulator, uniquely blending humor and intense drama. Immerse yourself in dynamic conversations with AI characters, negotiating with rooftop jumpers and confronting virtual criminals in heart-pounding shootouts. Your voice commands steer the narrative, making each decision impactful in this immersive experience.

Key Features:


Dynamic Conversations: Engage in realistic and dramatic talks, affecting the game's course.

Serious Challenges: Face tough situations, from high-stakes negotiations to tactical shootouts.

Voice-Controlled Action: Utilize your voice as a weapon and tool in this immersive VR cop simulator.

Realistic Environments: Explore lifelike virtual spaces, heightening the drama and intensity.

Narrative Depth: Experience a storyline weaving humor and intense moments, where every decision shapes your journey.

Whether negotiating with a potential jumper or taking down virtual criminals, your choices matter. This VR cop simulator promises a unique mix of humor and drama, ensuring an unforgettable virtual journey where your decisions shape the experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning! Game contains scenes with sexual content, moderate violence and cursing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 10000 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. HTC Vive not supported.
  • Additional Notes: No room requirements. OpenVR standard.

short_description: Dive into a voice-controlled VR cop simulator, where humor meets intense drama. Engage in realistic talks with AI characters, navigate tough situations, and make impactful decisions. Your virtual journey awaits!
